trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of controls contained on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de controles contidos em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control returns an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> which you can cast to an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controle retorna uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> que pode ser convertido em uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection> includes controls such as the editing control and the scrollbars on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection> inclui controles como o controle de edição e as barras de rolagem no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that owns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> que tem o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes all controls from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os controles do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection.Clear%2A> method removes all controls from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, except the scroll bars and the editing control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection.Clear%2A> método Remove todos os controles do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, exceto as barras de rolagem e o controle de edição.

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> array that is the destination of the elements copied from the current collection.
trans-unit.target: A matriz <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> unidimensional que é o destino dos elementos copiados da coleção atual.

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: A matriz deve ter indexação com base em zero.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero na <c>array</c> na qual a cópia começa.

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" /> into a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia o conteúdo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" /> em uma matriz <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />, começando no índice especificado da matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> é menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> é multidimensional.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the source collection is greater than the available space from <paramref name="index" /> to the end of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: O número de elementos na coleção de origem é maior do que o espaço disponível de <paramref name="index" /> até o final do <paramref name="array" />.

trans-unit.source: The type of the source element cannot be cast automatically to the type of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do elemento de origem não pode ser convertido automaticamente para o tipo de <paramref name="array" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert <c>value</c>.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no qual o <c>valor</c> será inserido.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to insert into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> a ser inserido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Insere o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> especificado no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" /> no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero or greater than or equal to the current number of controls in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> é menor que zero ou maior ou igual ao o número atual de controles no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> a ser removido de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified control from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Remove o controle especificado do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" />.
